name: Go
description: Go language support for Visual Studio Code (based on LSP)
author: Sourcegraph

go.gopath.description: Specifies the GOPATH to use when no environment variable is set.

go.goroot.description: Specifies the GOROOT to use when no environment variable is set.

scripts.isolated-vscode: npm run compile && VSCODE=$(which code-insiders || which code || echo echo ERROR: neither the code nor code-insiders vscode executable is installed); USER=dummy-dont-share-vscode-instance $VSCODE --user-data-dir=$PWD/.vscode-dev/user-data --extensionHomePath=$PWD/.vscode-dev/extensions --extensionDevelopmentPath=$PWD $*
